actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

official_title: To amend the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978 to terminate the application of section 210 of that Act to hydroelectric power facilities.

summary.text: Amends the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978 to declare that its provisions regarding small power production facilities do not apply to a hydroelectric power facility which received a license or exemption under the Federal Power Act after January 1989.

titles.title: To amend the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978 to terminate the application of section 210 of that Act to hydroelectric power facilities.
